EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Counterparty Manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
Thank you for joining Counterparty Manager, a secure and centralized location for your end to end client onboarding and lifecycle management needs. To get started, please provide:
• a number to reach out to you on and we will schedule a kick off call to talk you through next steps • a brief overview of what brought you to the platform in response to this email so that we can tailor the information you will be receiving to your specific needs.
Ahead of that call, we will provide a more detailed email with information and actions to be taken.
If you have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out to our support team via email at mcpmsupport@ihsmarkit.com or by telephone
UK Hotline: + 44 (0) 207 260 2102 US Hotline: + 1 212 488 4049 Singapore Hotline: + 65 6922 4258
We look forward to working with you.
Best regards,
Counterparty Manager Customer Services Team
